title: Free champs??
body: What's the free champs this week???

replies.body: go to www.surrenderat20.net moobeat keeps a good tab on it. he also does the sales list and whats on the pbe.

It's up now: http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/champions-skins/free-rotation/new-free-champion-rotation-graves-lulu-orianna-and-more

Sorry about the delay!
Next week can you please make gnar free to play I plan on buying him so I want to try him out and see how I go. Please! and Thank you!
buy him, if you don't like refund
That's a serious waste of a refund token, if you buy a champ you don't like you may as well keep them :/

Why is this in Esports?

Regardless the easy way in client to see the free weeks you don't own is selecting not owned, and just go through the list to see what you want to try.

Current free week:
Garen
Graves
Lulu
Orianna
Quinn
Shyvanna
Skarner
Syndra
Udyr
Zilean.
